duties_responsibilities.duty: Orchestrate and optimize the people, processes, and practices necessary to foster a creative environment for dynamic design.
Support and help develop best practices for the UX team on how to work together and deliver great work aligned with strategic initiatives.
Establish the operational foundation, strategy, and direction to ensure the UX teams have what they need to thrive and deliver great work.
Coach, mentor, and guide a small team of designers, as well as assign/schedule work across the design studio team in collaboration with design leads, deadlines, and shifting priorities.
Utilize data to articulate rationale, communicate recommendations with authority and openness, and advocate for design with partners and leaders at different levels.
Proactively partner with UX, Product, Tech & Business stakeholders to set the stage for the team to achieve exceptional outcomes.
Identify pain points in internal processes and implement solutions, all while fostering a collaborative and inclusive culture.
Facilitate internal meetings, assist the Head of Design with scheduling/HR/team health/budget, and maintain drive and patience throughout the journey.
Measure and report on the performance of design processes, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree (Master's preferred) in Design, Operations, Business, or a related field
